attributes.action: automatically fund early intervention initiatives in primary schools such as nurture groups.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Early intervention initiatives in primary schools such as nurture groups are proven to be effective for challenging children. For few hundred pounds per year, children receive extra support in a special group away from the classroom which benefits both them (e.g. less exclusions and increased educational attainment) and the remaining children who can be taught without disruption.
